document.bingtitle: Is white castle actually that good? - Yahoo!7 Answers
document.webtitle: Is white castle actually that good? - Yahoo!7 Answers
document.description: Select "Yes" from the pop up window. Nothing ... on a buttery but tiny rolls topped with condiments ... White Castle is my favorite fast food restaurant.

Resolved Question Show me another » Is white castle actually that good? I live in australia and there is no white castle franchise. Enlighten me 3 years ago Report Abuse
Additional Details and yes, i am basing this entirely on harold and kumar 3 years ago by Crockit Member since: 03 January 2010 Total points: 3,954 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Oh,yea,but you have to eat so many to get full. 3 years ago Report Abuse 44% 8 Votes 1 person rated this as good

This question about" Is white castle actu… "was originally asked on Yahoo! Answers United States
Other Answers (13) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Elle Z Member since: 20 August 2008 Total points: 19,178 (Level 6) Add Contact Block The burgers are sliders. Very thin meat patties with holes punched thru them so they can be cooked very quickly. They are greasy, served on a buttery but tiny rolls topped with condiments and served steaming warm. I do not care for them but always take the opportunity to seal my opinion of them when I go home to Chicago by visiting a local White Castle. It always results in the same indigestion but I have to say that McDonald's actually makes me ill while White Castle just doesn't"sit well". 3 years ago Report Abuse 11% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Scip Member since: 14 May 2009 Total points: 2,192 (Level 3) Add Contact Block You either love it or hate it. I live in Canada, and there are no White Castles here either. But I've driven to Detroit a few times and had the burgers there. I enjoyed them, but I know a lot who don't. I really like them, because I drove to Detroit, risking my life and getting shot to get some burgers, lol. 3 years ago Report Abuse 11% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Karamazo... Member since: 28 July 2008 Total points: 241,848 (Level 7) Badge Image: Add Contact Block Yes they are, if they are made fresh. thats the key. Out of the grocery store they're not all that great. Or if they sit on their grill for awhile, otherwise they are excellent, I've eaten there hundreds of times. They are costly though, 54 cents a piece plus tax. ~ 3 years ago Report Abuse 28% 5 Votes by B.J. W Member since: 18 February 2006 Total points: 951 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I live in Tennessee and we have Krystals here.Same concept.small,soft,square.Gotta eat 10 of them to get full.We call them gut bombers. 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Tech Dude Member since: 08 February 2008 Total points: 22,086 (Level 6) Add Contact Block White Castle is my favorite fast food restaurant. 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by blessed Member since: 17 December 2009 Total points: 185 (Level 1) Add Contact Block I've only eaten there one time; will never eat there again. There burgers taste like really bad microwaved food :) 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Brian B Member since: 18 November 2008 Total points: 3,157 (Level 4) Add Contact Block They are small, greasy, and are covered in sauteed onions. So if you like that kind of thing... 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Hyperion Member since: 18 September 2009 Total points: 464 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Are you basing this entirely on Harold and Kumar? 3 years ago Report Abuse 6% 1 Vote by alec Member since: 05 November 2009 Total points: 432 (Level 2) Add Contact Block yeaa 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Ashlee Member since: 27 December 2009 Total points: 184 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Well, they made a movie about it. Lol its got to be something special. 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by stringer... Member since: 17 February 2006 Total points: 451 (Level 2) Add Contact Block love white castle 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Yoohoo Y Member since: 27 January 2008 Total points: 257 (Level 2) Add Contact Block they are good bu tgreasy! 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by princess... Member since: 28 November 2009 Total points: 406 (Level 2) Add Contact Block yes it is awesome to me 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes
